alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Eastern Mineral; Hampshire; Morgan (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued December 15 at 6:49AM EST until December 15 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Significant icing. Additional sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of two to four tenths an inch. * WHERE...Washington and Frederick MD Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Hazardous travel conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will persist through the morning. Freezing rain will then transition to a soaking cold rain by this afternoon.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
